text: So rewarding to receive cards from my patients with #learningdisability thanking me for making their #COVID19 #vaccine experience a positive one 🙏🏽👍🏽 @MattHancock @CMO_England @jonathanleach13 @hssood @ChadNews @Notts_ICS @NHSNottsCCG @ClareGerada @HelenStokesLam @BBradley_Mans https://t.co/YqgTTQJdhF
